item.title: How do you change the xp rates?
item.dc:creator: @OnYx OnYx
item.description:
@OnYx wrote:

Hey l o l,
To find it find

if (FightType != 3) {

Then you should see something like this;

LoopAttDelay = PkingDelay; server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].hitDiff = hitDiff; server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].Killing[playerId] += hitDiff; server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].updateRequired = true; server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].hitUpdateRequired = true; double TotalExp = 0; if (FightType != 3) { TotalExp = (double)(350 * hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp * CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), SkillID); } else { TotalExp = (double)(200 * hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp * CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerAttack); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerDefence); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerStrength); } TotalExp = (double)(200 * hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp * CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerHitpoints); actionTimer = 7;

See where mine is 200 or 350? change that too what you want it to. Enjoy

Read full topic
